T02D1327:281b-1: shr'i badzri t'a re s'a dha nam /
T02D1327:282a-2: dpal rdo rje sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1327:282a-3: tshangs sogs 'jig rten mthu chen gtsug gi nor bu dang //
T02D1327:282a-4: sa bcu'i rgyal sras dbang thob gzhon nu'i cod pan gyis //
T02D1327:282a-5: zhabs pad la gtugs ma lus phongs las sgrol mdzad yum //
T02D1327:282a-6: dpal ldan ye shes lha mo rgyal rgyur cig /'jig rten dbang phyug dpal ldan ma //
T02D1327:282a-8: 'gro skyob ma de'i sgrub thabs bri //
T02D1327:282a-9: re zhig sgrub pa po 'phags ma sgrol ma chen mo la dad pa thob pas /
T02D1327:282a-10: nags tshal dang phug dang dur khrod la sogs par
T02D1327:282a-11: dben pa'i yid kyis snying rje'i stan la 'dug la
T02D1327:282a-12: / dang po kho nar chos thams cad rten cing
T02D1327:282a-13: 'brel par 'byung ba'i rang bzhin skye ba med par
T02D1327:282a-14: / bsgom par bya'o // de nas snying rje chen pos bskul te /
T02D1327:282a-15: pam las padma aa las zla ba'i steng du dbyangs
T02D1327:282a-16: dang gsal byed kyis rnam par brgyan pa'i rang gi
T02D1327:282a-17: rnam par mi rtog pa'i bdag nyid t'am ljang gur
T02D1327:282a-18: bsgom mo // de las 'od 'phros pas phyogs bcu'i
T02D1327:282a-19: sems can thams cad kyi gdung bzhi bar byas nas
T02D1327:282a-20: byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang
T02D1327:282a-22: slar 'dus pas t'am la thim par blta'o //
T02D1327:282a-23: de ma thag tu dpal rdo rje sgrol ma chen
T02D1327:282a-24: mo sku mdog ljang gu'am aintra bcag pa'am ston gyi
T02D1327:282a-25: nam mkha' dri ma med pa lta bu /
T02D1327:282a-26: lang tsho la bab pa'i cha lugs /
T02D1327:282a-27: sgeg cing zhi la yid du 'ong ba dpe med pa bsams te /
T02D1327:282a-28: skyil krung phyed pas brtan pa'i sku 'gying ma /
T02D1327:282a-30: g-yon pas autpala sngon po rgyas pa'i sdong bu thugs kar 'dzin pa /
T02D1327:282a-31: cod pan la sogs pa rin po che rnam pa du ma 'od 'bar bas nye bar mdzes shing /
T02D1327:282a-32: rang bzhin gyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor khor yug 'dom gsum mnga' ba /
T02D1327:282a-33: zhal 'dzum pa'i cha byad blta bas mi ngoms pa /
T02D1327:282a-34: spyan mnga' zhing thams cad gzigs pa'i bdag nyid ma /
T02D1327:282a-35: nu ma 'bur zhing rked pa rnam par phra ba la brla rab tu rgyas ma /
T02D1327:282a-36: tshon brgya rtsa gcig gis spras pa'i na bza' sham thabs can /
T02D1327:282a-37: rin po che'i me tog dang rdo rje'i phreng ba do shal brgyus pa'o //
T02D1327:282a-38: de nas thugs kar nyid kyi sa bon gyi yi ge bltas nas /
T02D1327:282b-0: de'i 'od zer gyis ye shes kyi 'phags ma @282b
T02D1327:282b-1: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba spyan drangs
T02D1327:282b-3: mi snyed 'byor ba dang blos sprul pa'i mchod pas mchod la /
T02D1327:282b-4: sdig rba bshags pa la sogs pa bya ste dngos grub blangs nas ro gcig tu gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1327:282b-5: de'i rjes la snying po can gyi mthar sngags 'di dang /
T02D1327:282b-6: gzungs 'di nye bar bkod la rtse gcig tu bzlas so //
T02D1327:282b-7: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sv'a h'a /
T02D1327:282b-8: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
T02D1327:282b-9: na ma: a'ar+y'a wa lo ki te shva r'a ya /
T02D1327:282b-12: ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
T02D1327:282b-14: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sarba du sht'am /
T02D1327:282b-23: sarba dushta stam bha ni t'a re sv'a h'a /
T02D1327:282b-24: snying po'i sngags la ni 'bum phrag bcu bsnyen zhing /
T02D1327:282b-25: gzungs sngags la ni 'bum phrag gcig gam gsum la sogs pa ci rigs par shes par bya'o //
T02D1327:282b-26: de nas las la sbyar ba yang de nyid do //
T02D1327:282b-27: stobs bskyed pa'i phyir gtor ma sbyin pa ni /
T02D1327:282b-28: bcom ldan 'das ma'i nga rgyal la gnas pas /
T02D1327:282b-29: autpalas mtshan pa'i snod du bza' ba bzang po dang tshod ma dang bcas pa sbyang te /
T02D1327:282b-30: bgegs bsal zhing yi ge bzhis dri ma bsang ba dang /
T02D1327:282b-33: mngon par dgyes pa'i rgyur lan gsum du byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D1327:282b-34: padma kha phye ba'i phyag rgyas dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1327:282b-35: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dha rmm'an'am dya
T02D1327:282b-36: nutpa nna tv'ata aom a'a: h'um t'am phat sv'a h'a
T02D1327:282b-37: / aom na ma: sarba buddh'a bo dhi satv'a n'am /
T02D1327:282b-38: aa pra ti ha ta sh'a sa n'a nam /
T02D1327:282b-39: he he bhag wa ti badzra t'a ra ma h'a s'a h'a /
T02D1327:282b-40: sarba buddh'a wa lo ki te ai dam ba lim gri han aa mram ta kh'a hi kh'a hi /
T02D1327:282b-41: tishtha tishtha h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1327:282b-48: sarba bighnan bi n'a ya ka / ma h'a ga
T02D1327:282b-49: na pa ti j'ai wi t'anta ka r'a ya h'um
T02D1327:282b-51: rnam dag rdo rje sgrol ma che //
T02D1327:282b-52: skye bo dman la lha mo'i tshul //
T02D1327:282b-53: de nyid 'od kyi rnam pa las //
T02D1327:282b-54: rang bzhin rnam pa gzhan yod min //
T02D1327:282b-55: khams gsum 'od kyis bsdus nas ni //
T02D1327:282b-56: dpal mo nyid la mngon par thim //
T02D1327:282b-57: sku yang dbyangs dang gsal byed ma //
T02D1327:282b-58: de yang rdo rje 'dzin ma la'o //
T02D1327:283a-2: thig le stong pa yi ge med //
T02D1327:283a-3: de nyid sems kyi mtshan nyid de //
T02D1327:283a-4: rang sems gdod nas ma skyes pa'o //
T02D1327:283a-5: dpal ldan ye shes sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs ni //
T02D1327:283a-6: mtshan ma mchog mthong bla ma las thob ji bzhin du //
T02D1327:283a-7: sgrub po rnams la phan phyir bdag gis bris pa yis //
T02D1327:283a-8: 'gro ba ma lus myur du 'phags ma mnyes byed shog //
T02D1327:283a-9: dpal ldan rdo rje sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs /
T02D1327:283a-10: slob dpon dge ba'i mgon pos mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1327:283a-12: // / pandi ta chen po buddha shr'i bha dra dang /
